p:
There is a body of literature suggesting that R 0 for influenza is in the 1.0–2.0 range [ 24]. However, based on these data we have observed most of the posterior density falls outside this range when a broad prior is used ( Fig 4); specifically, the lower limit of the 90% credible interval for
R ¯
0
is 1.7, with only 10.6% of accepted parameter sets (2099 of 19772) below 2.0.
